metadata.title: CVE-2014-8761 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: inc/template.php in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a only checks for access tothe root namespace, which allows remote attackers to access arbitraryimages via a media file details ajax call.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
